title: Introduction: The scenario as postmodern interpretive strategy
The SUPPORT Study: An Alternative Scenario
Restructuring of Corporate India: The Emerging Scenario
container-title: Vikalpa: The Journal for Decision Makers
items.abstract: <jats:p> Corporate India has been steadily restructuring itself through mergers, acquisitions, divestitures, and other means as it repositions itself in the post-liberaliza tion environment. While examining the restructuring trends, N Venkiteswaran asserts that the restructuring phenomenon is set to gather pace in the coming months. </jats:p>
